profile_positions.description:
•	orchestrating and supporting design teams in effective digital Design Language System development and delivery
•	understand the context of both developers and designers and able to form an opinion about the content
•	championing the use of best fitted agile ways of working, create great team dynamics, and help a group of individuals successfully operate as a team. Responsible for quarterly planning(PIPE).
•	bringing the most value from activities along the customer needs, handle the competing constraints, monitor and report project budgets, manage risks, highlight and brainstorm dependencies and assumptions taken and generally keep things moving along smoothly.
•	managing stakeholder expectations and reporting out together with Business Partner. Managing quarter reviews and Demos
•	collaborating with internal and external stakeholders and objects to be achieved, monitoring, presenting and communicating as needed
•	driving continuous improvement for the team in a structured and methodical ways
•	participate in outsourcing ideas and streamlining the process together with design management team
profile_positions.title: Design Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Network Lead, working in customer integrated platform as solution experts of the Finance SAP IT team
•	Aligning with business for requirement gathering also participating in workshops related to new business models area in finance. 
•	 IT Business Partnership to strengthen the relation between IT and business in Medtronic
•	Understanding of processes / methodology with regards to releases, documentation and test requirements that allow to coach external parties in successfully delivering capabilities on platforms for which our team has final responsibility. 
•	Responsible and managing major implementations of SAP solutions for the entire EMEA region
•	Working closely with colleagues in the India, US and the strategic partners of Medtronic to strengthen business partnership
•	Act as the key liaison across all functional areas, including business units, the information technology department.
•	Create consensus with other functions as to the timing of solution introductions and withdrawals.
•	Collaborate with architecture and operations teams to ensure solution compatibility with company standards.
profile_positions.title: IT Senior SAP Finance Business Analyst

profile_positions.location: Eindhoven Area, Netherlands (Employee of Wipro Technologies)
profile_positions.description:
Responsible for leading 29 direct people globally, projects management business development, structuring & strategic planning services that lead to improved controls and efficiencies in project delivery.
•	Responsible for managing implementation projects, improving people, processes and products.
•	Development and closing of highly complex SAP FICO/PS solutions to senior client executives to Philips and other Wipro’s prospective client
•	Led cross-functional implementations to develop application/technology strategies, with supporting financial budgets which tied to overall business objectives.
•	Managing IT finances – including operating budget, capital budget, accounts payables, fixed assets, and cost allocations to business functions.
•	Identifying key project risks, whether stated or not, and managing them to resolution or escalating them accordingly managing escalation from stakeholders.
•	Seasoned solution and SAP consultant providing effective and efficient To- Be business process.
•	Working in Agile, Managing sprits. Training new joiners to the project. Driving cross skill initiative in the project.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
I managed the operation and technology platform of SAP Consumer lifestyle. Advise & support clients on business and IT strategy, & Finance solutions in SAP. I provide client introductions, customer context to internal teams. Resolve operation escalations, crisis and complaints, mentor team with an objective of demonstrating business value to the client also enhancing client satisfaction. Experienced and Managed complex project- GAIS migration for Consumer lifestyle, part of Gemini cutover activities for Personal Health, Managed YEC for multiple projects with Philips leaders. Managed CL AMS SAP FICO project (L2 &L3 support) and Managing I2M project as a Project Manager 
 
•	Lead teams across broad technical, financial and business disciplines. Focused teams on business objectives and tracked progress to ensure project milestones were completed on time, on budget and with the desired results. Have trained rookies, mid-senior & senior people in Philips process and WOW together with SAP FICO and PS. 
•	Extensive experience to work with Service Lead, Service Manager, DM, ITBP on structured reporting with help of presentations & excels together with interpreted outcomes, including risk factors. Responsible for maintaining proper documentation with proper versioning in SharePoint owned by the track. 
•	Create and manage and monitor project schedules, cost and progress 
•	Manage risk, scope, quality and CSAT 
•	Mitigated risk factors through careful analysis of financial and statistical data. Anticipated and managed change effectively in rapidly evolving global business environments Transition leadership for Europe tracks 
•	Managing the communication protocol across levels, announcements like IT for you etc.
•	Lead project Audits, customer security audits and reviews 
•	Knowledge in Escalations & Crisis Management
•	Also awarded “Kaizen for Philips” by Fernando Rodríguez Afonso & Peter Sluis for automation proposal in CL and which was rolled-out to multiple kernels.
profile_positions.title: Manager Project Management

profile_positions.description:
End to end responsible to maintain and support the SAP Kernel in the project assigned. This include 2nd and 3rd level production support, change management, release management, configuration management, problem management and upgrades. Also responsible to analyse customer enhancement requirements. 

•	Handling critical issues related to functional areas
•	Mentoring Team members.
•	Providing training regarding process and functionalities to Team
•	Preparing Weekly reports of individual performance within Team
•	Worked as a Senior consultant for YEC activities from Nov 2014 to Jan 2015
•	Working on Incidents, Service Requests, Problem tickets and Corrective Changes.
•	Also working on Change Request, Preparing FS and DS, customizing 
•	Discussion on Technical team on customizing objects. 6. Customizing based on Business scenario in SAP 
•	Performing Unit testing and coordinating on End to End testing 
•	Promoting changes to Quality after successful Unit Test with all required approval from QA, Release Manager 
•	Conducting Workshop with business describing the entire project scenario 
•	Creating Test cases for Business User, Conducting UAT with user 
•	Preparing work instructions and explain to business users. 
•	Discussion with Architect regarding new/change of business requirements 
•	Accelerating Bug fixes. 
•	Preparing KT understanding document and presenting to AMS team members
•	Worked in SAP FI-AA, FI-MM,FI-SD, Idocs, Z-programs, Job management, Finance, material revaluation, Cost centre accounting, profit center accounting, Internal orders, Project Systems.
profile_positions.title: IT Business Analyst

volunteer_experiences.description: We worked towards the welfare of Children whose parents were working as labour in Brick Land and was not earning enough for their clothing and education. we conducted interactive sessions for their education and collected clothes for them.
